# wu-card



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property       | Attribute       | Description                                                                                           | Type      | Default     |
| -------------- | --------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `cardSubtitle` | `card-subtitle` | Subtitle of the card                                                                                  | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `cardTitle`    | `card-title`    | Title of the card                                                                                     | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `flat`         | `flat`          | If this card has flat (border) style                                                                  | `boolean` | `undefined` |
| `hover`        | `hover`         | If this card is hoverable                                                                             | `boolean` | `undefined` |
| `mediaAbove`   | `media-above`   | Position of media in the card                                                                         | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `mediaAlt`     | `media-alt`     | Card image alt text                                                                                   | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `mediaSrc`     | `media-src`     | Card image source url, if specified, image will display on top of the card.                           | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `mediaThumb`   | `media-thumb`   | Thumbnail version of the card image, image will be loaded progressively if `media-thumb` is specified | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `theme`        | `theme`         | Make card themable                                                                                    | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `thumbnailSrc` | `thumbnail-src` |                                                                                                       | `string`  | `undefined` |


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                            | Description                          |
| ------------------------------- | ------------------------------------ |
| `--wu-card-inner-padding`       | Padding inside card between sections |
| `--wu-card-outer-padding`       | Outer padding for the card           |
| `--wu-card-radius-bottom-left`  | Corner radius                        |
| `--wu-card-radius-bottom-right` | Corner radius                        |
| `--wu-card-radius-top-left`     | Corner radius                        |
| `--wu-card-radius-top-right`    | Corner radius                        |
